phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
At the royal capital of the Clover Kingdom, the entrance exam for the Magic Knights,
who protect the kingdom under the Wizard King, had begun.
In the final part of the exam, the candidates were paired off
Bronze Creation Magic: Sekke Magnum Cannonball!
How do you like my magic?
It is bronzified and protects me as it shoots out magical bullets.
It is offense and defense all in one!
It will block all of your lame attacks, which will show off my defensive powers,
and then I will finish you off once you have worn yourself out.
There is no need to hold back.
The Path to the Wizard King
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Well, we know who is going to win.
There is no way some kid from the boonies can break through that.
Man, I wish I was fighting that kid.
What is the deal with that shabby grimoire?
You are never going to make it into any of the squads, kid!
There is no need to hold back.
Make sure you struggle as much as you can to make things exciting!
Is he using some kind of high-speed movement magic?
the Magic Knights so I can have a good time and avoid working hard.
I am here to work my butt off and become the Wizard King!
I am the one who is going to defeat you...
Was not he just some loser from the boonies?
I told you, I am going to become the Wizard King!
You got a problem with that?!
What the heck is that peasant from the boonies saying?
Just get outta here already, you stupid brat!
Who are you calling a stupid brat?!
Could it be some kind of creation magic?
Judging from the other parts of the exam,
it did not seem like he had that much magical power.
Actually, maybe it is not that he is not using magic...
It is that he does not have any magical power.
Come to think of it, I did not sense any mana from him.
And yet, he wants to become the Wizard King, huh?
Looks like we have got a strange one on our hands.
They have way too much magical power and talent to begin with.
On second thought, maybe the shrimp really is just a small-time lame-o.
His opponent must have just let his guard down too much.
You seem to be having a hard time finding an opponent.
Why do not you pair up with me?
You may have been chosen by the four-leaf, but you are no noble.
I will show you just how far below us nobles you are, both in status and power.
Oh, and of course, in wealth, too.
You should know that it is an honor just to be able to fight
You can tell the tale for the rest of your life when you go back to your village.
I will even pay for your trip back home.
Salim, a noble, was defeated in an instant!
I want to be his friend, too.
Candidates whose numbers are called, please step forward.
The squad captains will raise their hands if they would like you
The candidates will decide if they would like to accept or decline,
and if they are chosen by more than one captain,
they may choose which squad they would like to join.
But if no one raises their hands,
that candidate will not join the Magic Knights.
Wow, someone finally raised their hand.
Well, I guess I expected that.
I will just go back to my village and till my fields.
All who wish to offer, please raise your hand.
I-I thought that only royalty and nobles could join the Golden Dawn.
But he is a kid from the boonies!
I will take the best path to becoming the Wizard King.
Please allow me to join the Golden Dawn.
But I wanted to be his friend...
I cannot let Yuno get ahead of me!
All who wish to offer, please raise your hand.
I do not care which squad it is...
No matter how high your combat skills are,
if the source of your power is unknown, no one wants anything to do with it.
In the end, the only thing desired from a Magic Knight
the magical power of a Magic Knights Squad captain?
And since you have no magical powers, no one wants you.
You said earlier that you wanted to become the Wizard King, did not you?
Which means you are going to surpass the nine captains here, right?
Now that I am standing before you, do you still have the nerve
to say that you are going to be the Wizard King,
E-Even if I cannot join the Magic Knights today...
No matter how many times I fall,
no matter what anyone says to me,
I am still going to become the Wizard King someday!
I am telling you that I will let you join the Black Bulls.
By the way, declining is not an option.
I will make life so miserable for you in the Black Bulls that you will be torn to shreds,
This concludes the Magic Knights Entrance Exam.
This is where our true battle begins!
Was it the grilled purple snake I ate to psyche myself up?!
It is ready to stick its head out!
After humiliating me in front of everyone,
do not think I am just going to let you leave, Asta.
Because of you, I was only offered a position in one of the lower ranking squads,
You are just a hick from the boonies.
You think you can become the Wizard King?
Bronze Hex Magic: Sekke's Poison Lizard.
I will test your luck for you.
If your luck's bad, you will be bedridden for life.
I was just going to give him a little scare.
You know, as a parting gift.
T-To see who will make it further in this world.
You are no match for Asta.
I have no regrets or poop left in me.
You have got some nerve, making me wait.
How long does it take you to take a dump?
That is not what I meant!
Who asked you to start talking about your turds, you moron?!
you are going to have to learn some transport magic, too.
You do not have any magical powers!
Er, sorry to bug you, Yami, but it is a bit hard to keep a gate this size open,
so could you just go through quickly?
Who do you think you are ordering around?
Tough it out, and surpass your limits.
Starting today, I am also going to be...
I am Asta from Hage Village!
I will be joining the Black Bulls tod
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
Your Sekke Magnum Cannonball has such a cool name!
Your Holy Lightning Rising Salim is not so bad, either.
Sekke, I believe we could be the best of friends.
We are finally the Magic Knights we always hoped to be!
It looks I ended up in some crazy place!
Black Clover, Page 6: The Black Bulls.
Not giving up is my magic!
